SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Megan Skidmore’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that educators will understand the challenges facing students learning English and support them in their language development…”

– Mrs. Megan Skidmore, Kindergarten Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/educators-understand-student-english-language-development-challenge/
